text: The 4 × 110 yards relay event at the 1926 Women's World Games was the second time the 4 × 110 yards relay was held at Women's World Games. The event took place in Gothenburg at the Slottsskogsvallen during the last day of the Games on 29 August 1926. Four years later the at the 1930 Women's World Games the 4 × 110 yards relay was replaced by the 4 x 100 metres relay event. The Biritsh team won the event in a new world record time of 49.8 seconds, beating the American record from 1924 of 51 seconds. ==Results== Rank Nation Athletes Time Notes Dorothy Scouler, Florence Haynes, Eileen Edwards, Rose Thompson 49.8 WR , , Yolande Plancke, Marguerite Radideau 51.2 , , , Marie Vidláková 52.8 4 Sylvia Stave, Vera Jacobsson, Märta Johansson, Asta Plathino 53.0 Janina Grabicka, Wacława Sadkowska, Wiera Czajkowska, 53.2 3rd in the heats? title: 1926 Women's World Games – 4 × 110 yards relay
